description.en: Avoid cow's milk, ghee, curd and buttermilk on this day. Give grass to cows and pray to them.

shlokas:
gOkSIraM gOghRtaM caiva dadhi takraM ca varjayEt.

surabhi tvaM jaganmAtardEvi viSNupadE sthitA.
sarvadEvamayE grAsaM mayA dattamidaM grasa..

sarvadEvamayE dEvi sarvEdEvaizca satkRtA.
mAtarmamA'bhilASitaM saphalaM kuru nandini..
